thread.title: Britney Spears's Yoga Video Will Have You Screaming, "You Better Work!"
thread.title_full: Britney Spears's Yoga Video Will Have You Screaming, "You Better Work!"

author: Perri Konecky
title: Britney Spears's Yoga Video Will Have You Screaming, "You Better Work!"
text:
Britney Spears Handstand Yoga Video Britney Spears's Yoga Video Will Have You Screaming, "You Better Work!"   Perri Konecky 52 Shares A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:36pm PST 
Britney Spears is constantly blowing our minds with her impressive flexibility and upside-down yoga moves , but now we're seeing how she does it, and excuse us while we pick our jaws up off the floor. Britney flaunted her perfect handstand moves on Instagram , writing, "Owning my temple, my body, through yoga." She's balancing her handstand against the wall, but Britney has also used a Bosu ball to tone her upper body. She loves being upside down, and her muscular core and arms can attest to that!
